au.gov.naa.digipres.xena.kernel.properties
Class PluginProperties

java.lang.Object
  au.gov.naa.digipres.xena.kernel.properties.PluginProperties

public abstract class PluginProperties
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class representing the set of properties for a plugin. Each plugin with properties to set should create an extension of this class, and implement the getName, getProperties and initialiseProperties methods. The getProperties method can be used to retrieve a List of XenaProperties which can be loaded and saved individually, or the getPropertiesDialog method can be used to retrieve a dialog containing input fields and buttons etc which will display and save updated properties automatically. created 10/04/2006 xena Short desc of class:

getName

public abstract java.lang.String getName()
Returns the name of this properties set. Will generally just be the name of the plugin.

Returns:
properties set name

getProperties

public abstract java.util.List<XenaProperty> getProperties()
Returns a List of XenaProperties representing the property set for this plugin.

Returns:

initialiseProperties

public abstract void initialiseProperties()
Initialises the property set for this plugin. This method is called by PropertiesManager after each PluginProperties object has been first created.

getPropertiesDialog

public PropertiesDialog getPropertiesDialog(java.awt.Window parent)
Returns a dialog which will display a method for modifying the property value for each property (for example a simple text entry field for String properties, a text entry field and a Browse button for File properties, etc). The dialog will be a child of the given parent Window, which must be either a Frame or a Dialog.

Parameters:
parent - Frame or Window
Returns:
PropertiesDialog representing the property set for this plugin

property value
